title: Ammonium Persulphate
description: A strong oxidizing agent used in various industrial applications.
storageHandling: Store in a cool, dry place. Avoid exposure to moisture and heat.
applications: Used in polymerization, as an oxidizing agent in chemical reactions, and in the manufacture of bleaches.

title: Sodium Persulphate
description: Used as a bleaching agent and an etchant for printed circuit boards.
storageHandling: Store in a dry, cool place. Protect from moisture and direct sunlight.
applications: Used in the cleaning and etching of printed circuit boards (PCBs), as well as a bleaching agent in various industrial processes.

title: Ammonium Sulphate
description: An efficient fertilizer for various soil types and industrial uses.
storageHandling: Store in a cool, dry place. Keep away from moisture.
applications: Primarily used as a nitrogen fertilizer for crops, but also used in industrial applications like water treatment.

title: Potassium Persulphate
description: Commonly used in polymerization, etching, and soil conditioning.
storageHandling: Store in a dry, cool environment. Avoid moisture and high temperatures.
applications: Used as a polymerization initiator, in soil conditioning, and in various other chemical applications.
